lead_paragraph: Spurs crushed Stoke, an emphatic response to Leicester’s draw Sunday that closed the gap atop the league standings to 5 points with four games left.

headline.print_headline: Tottenham Carves Into Leicester’s Lead by Routing Stoke
headline.main: Tottenham Carves Into Leicester’s Premier League Lead

snippet: Spurs crushed Stoke, an emphatic response to Leicester’s draw Sunday that closed the gap atop the league standings to 5 points with four games left.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Tottenham Hotspur defeats Stoke City, 4-0; other soccer news noted.
